original: intros d a t ladj e s H. intros H0. induction H0 using mreconnaissance_ind; intros. - apply rec_term_correct_lem_4. + auto. + apply IHm with (ladj:=ladj) (e:=e); auto. - apply rec_term_correct_lem_5 with (s:=s). + auto. + apply non_coacc_invariant_lem_3 with (d:=d) (a:=a0) (t:=t) (n:=n) (s:=s) (p:=p); auto.
